name: Treemap
description: The main purpose of the component is proportional display of data.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to disable the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable the component.

properties.name: title
properties.label: Title
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify a label for the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify a title for the component.

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify the width of the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the component's width in pixels(px) or percentages(%).

properties.name: height
properties.label: Height
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify the height of the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the component's height in pixels(px) or percentages(%).

properties.name: fillBrushes
properties.label: Fill Brushes
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify the fill brushes.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the fill brushes.

properties.name: fillScaleLogarithmic
properties.label: Fill Scale Logarithmic
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to control the logarithmic fill scale.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to control the logarithmic fill scale.

properties.name: headerDisplayMode
properties.label: Header Display Mode
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to specify the header display mode.
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to specify the header display mode.

properties.name: data
properties.label: Data
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add data to the component.
